item.title: ðŸ’€ Skeleton Game P-ROC
item.description: SkeletonGame is a framework built upon the original pyprocgame framework for P-ROC (pinball controller boards). Uses the SDL2 game display for full color display and scripting is in the Python language. There are quite a few production games that use this framework or have used as a base. SkeletonGame Framework SkeletonGame.com SkeletonGame Manager Application To aid with creating games on the SkeletonGame (pyprocgame) framework. Github Source Github Wiki Dotnet SkeletonGame mode generator Generate new mode files for a game with dotnet on command line
item.dc:creator: HorsePin
